name: Salesforce Notification Service
description: Post a chatter message to the right person

USERNAME.Description: username of the SF Connected App
USERNAME.value: username of the SF Connected App

QUEUING_SYSTEM.Description: Which system to use for the queuing system: values are KAFKA/CLOUDAMQP. Will default to CLOUDAMQP

SANDBOX.Description: Connects to a sandbox or a scratch org (True/False)

JWTKEY.Description: Certificate to use to authenticate using jwt token

SUBSCRIBE_CHANNEL.Description: name of the channel the service must connect to when starting
